title: Park Tae-gyu
text:
Park Tae-Gyu (; born 21 February 1990) is a <a href="Korean%20people">Korean</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>, who currently plays as forward for <a href="Busan%20Transportation%20Corporation%20FC">Busan Transportation Corporation FC</a>.
He previously played with Serbian club <a href="FK%20Be%C5%BEanija">FK Bežanija</a>. In summer 2012 he joined <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a> side <a href="FK%20BSK%20Bor%C4%8Da">FK BSK Borča</a>.
